metadata.description: Earth is besieged by alien enforcers, and some of the most powerful people on the planet...are the kids!­ The Harbinger Renegades are still reeling from a tragic death in their ranks, but in the face of monumental destruction they'll find unlikely allies in a fellow group of super-powerful teenagers. But is Generation Zero here to help...or are they just looking out for themselves?
metadata.name: Armor Hunters: Harbinger
